following_production.overview: After meeting with newly elected U.S. President Thaddeus Ross, Sam finds himself in the middle of an international incident. He must discover the reason behind a nefarious global plot before the true mastermind has the entire world seeing red.
following_production.title: Captain America: Brave New World

overview: Agatha Harkness gathers a coven of witches and sets off down, down, down The Witches' Road.
title: Agatha All Along
